message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. It's a fair start!
Let's be realistic, Alice. I'm feeling generous today.
I understand your generosity, Bob, but I think we can find a more equitable split. Let's try 55/45 this time.
Time is ticking, Alice. Don't let this opportunity slip away.
Bob, I'm still hoping for a more balanced deal. I'm willing to go up to 60/40.  Let's work together to find a solution before time runs out.
This is my final offer, Alice. Take it or leave it.
